content:
Craft an item of type: piston
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 56, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_concrete_powder", "quantity": 36, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 22, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a piston, I need to first craft jungle_planks. Jungle_planks can be crafted from jungle_wood. Therefore, I will move the jungle_wood from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: piston

thought: I have crafted crimson_planks, which can also be used to craft a piston. I will move the crimson_planks from slot 0 to slot 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: piston
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 56, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_concrete_powder", "quantity": 36, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 22, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a piston, I need to craft redstone first. To do so, I need to place a redstone_block in the crafting grid. I will place the redstone_block from slot 40 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: piston
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 56, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_concrete_powder", "quantity": 36, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 22, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 44}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: piston
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_fence", "quantity": 56, "index": 11}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 13}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "black_concrete_powder", "quantity": 36, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_crystal", "quantity": 22, "index": 22}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 52, "index": 44}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft a piston. A piston requires placing 1 oak_planks|spruce_planks|birch_planks|jungle_planks|acacia_planks|dark_oak_planks|crimson_planks|warped_planks in slot 1, 1 cobblestone in slot 4, 1 iron_ingot in slot 5, and 1 cobblestone in slot 6. Therefore I will first need to move the crimson_planks from slot 12 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: piston

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1
